text: Namɨlaŋ 11.25-26 Mt 5.23, 6.14-15, Kl 3.13 Asɨ dɨ aba abaŋ hɨnihɨniŋ kulaŋ mu namɨlaŋ kulaŋ hugɨ daŋ agasaŋ hɨji lamɨdɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Haman hɨji lama ha nudɨ hugɨ agadɨ civɨkalaŋ uamalɨ. Lɨlaŋ naludɨ Iaganalu Asɨ nudɨ kɨlebɨla hɨvɨ hɨnihɨdi agaŋ naludɨ hugɨ agɨladɨ aveji civɨdɨ uamalɨ.11.25-26 Kulaŋ hɨji hutesɨ hutesɨ daŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nɨman abahɨdavi. Ciaŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ aveji Asɨ dɨ manasɨŋ hadi hɨvɨ hɨnihɨdavi uahɨdavi. Jisasɨ abamalɨ uahɨdavi. Namɨlaŋ kulaŋ mu dɨ hugɨ ma civɨlaŋ naludɨ Iaganalu Asɨ nudɨ kɨlebɨla hɨvɨ hɨnihɨdi agaŋ naludɨ hugɨ agɨladɨ aveji ma civɨdɨ aba abamalɨ uahɨdavi.
